message: When I return to reality, Toue is down on one knee in front of me... smiling.

name: 東江
message: "Heh... Magnificent. Victory is yours."

name: 東江
message: "It appears fate chose you after all."

name: 東江
message: "But that is well. Fate is capricious, as it should be."
Toue slowly rises to his feet. Despite the sweat on his brow, he remains calm.

name: 東江
message: "Time for me to exit the stage. It is only proper, having been defeated."

name: 東江
message: "Go. Sei is behind that door."

Toue glances toward a door at the back of the room.
But I don't make a move.

Exit the stage...<K>
Does he mean...?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you..."
...I stop myself.
Toue's smile deepens, as if to answer the question I didn't ask.

name: 東江
message: "My little bird is leaving the nest. He deserves a grand sendoff."
He's going to...
...I pull my eyes away from him and head to the door.

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, let's go."
No looking back.
The door is heavy and elaborately decorated.
I grab the handle and give it a gentle push.
